page.title: 04ST.BEDE'S MIDDLE SCHOOL,SEND
page.content: The school was officially opened on 22nd April 1939 as a secondary school. It changed to a junior school on 5th September 1972. It then became a middle school on 7th September 1976. At present there are about 230 children in 8 classes. We have a large assembly hall, a gymnasium, science room and library as well as 8 classes. Outside we have two large fields and two swimming pools, one of which is heated. Most of the children wear a school uniform of grey trousers, blue pullovers (boys) and white blouse, blue jumper and skirt, (girls). The two feeder schools are Ripley First School and Send First School. Children come to our school from as far away as Wisley and Ockham and are coached to school.
